privacy.introduction: At Vehicles Control Check, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our mobile app.
privacy.information_collection: We do not collect any personal information through our mobile app, except during the authentication process via Firebase for logging in with Google and Facebook. This process is managed by Firebase, and we do not store any personal data on our servers.
privacy.information_use: The information collected during the authentication process is used solely to allow you access to the app. We do not share, sell, or use your personal information for any other purpose.
privacy.information_security: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Authentication and data storage are managed by Firebase, which complies with industry security standards.
privacy.your_rights: You may request access to, correction of, or deletion of your personal information at any time. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the contact information provided in the app.
privacy.policy_updates: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy in the app. We recommend that you review this policy periodically to stay informed about how we protect your information.

userterms.presentation: Vehicles Control Check - Terms of Use
userterms.introduction: Welcome to Vehicles Control Check. By using this app, you agree to comply with the following terms of use:
userterms.term1text: This app is designed to help users track maintenance, breakdowns, and other events related to their vehicles. We do not store any personal data on our servers, except for the authentication process via Firebase.
userterms.term2text: User authentication is done via Firebase, allowing access with Google and Facebook. We do not collect or store personal data.
userterms.term3text: All information recorded in the app is stored locally on the user's device. It is the user's responsibility to keep this information secure and to make backups if deemed necessary.
userterms.term4text: Vehicles Control Check is not responsible for any damage or loss of data resulting from the use of the app.

error.email_no_valid: Invalid email, please enter a correct address
error.no_network: No network, please check your connection and try again
error.password_should_be_6: Password must be at least 6 characters
error.auth/network-request-failed: Unable to verify credentials, please check your connection.
error.no_network_to_backup: No connection available, automatic backups will be skipped for this session.
error.invalid_file_text: You must select a single file with a .vcc extension
error.file_notcreated_text: The file could not be created, please check if a backup file for your user already exists in the path 'Documents/vehicles-control'
error.incorrect_user_text: The user owning the vehicles does not match the session user
error.error_cleaning_text: Error cleaning files, please check your connection and try again later

alert.user_created_success_text: Please check your email to confirm your account (the email might be in your spam/junk folder)
alert.temporarily_disabled: The account has been temporarily disabled for security
alert.temporarily_disabled_text: Invalid data has been entered repeatedly; if you wish to reactivate it immediately, reset your password by pressing RESET PASSWORD and you will receive an email with a link.
alert.email_no_verified: The account has not been verified
alert.email_no_verified_text: Please check your email (the email might be in your spam/junk folder). If you haven't received the email, try resending it by pressing the RESEND button
alert.write_a_correct_email_text: Please enter an email in the EMAIL box and then press Forgot your password?, you will receive a restoration email
alert.restored_email_sended: A password restoration email has been sent. Please check your email (the email might be in your spam/junk folder).
alert.vehicle_registered_text: The vehicle has been successfully registered, you can now see it on your main page
alert.vehicle_erased_text: The vehicle has been successfully deleted
alert.vehicle_permanently_erased: The vehicle and all associated events and notifications will be permanently deleted
alert.impossible_to_delete_text: The vehicle has not been synchronized with the database, please try again later
alert.userimg_changed_text: The user image has been changed
alert.an_error_ocurred_try_again: An error occurred, please try again
alert.photo_is_too_bigger_text: The photo size is greater than 1048487 bytes and could not be synchronized, please select a smaller photo
alert.vehicle_exists_text: A vehicle with the same name already exists, please change the vehicle name
alert.photo_will_permanently_erased: The photo will be permanently deleted
alert.please_write_more_information_text: You must specify at least the vehicle, the date, and the type of event
alert.event_permanently_erased: The event will be permanently deleted
alert.event_erased_text: The event has been successfully deleted
alert.enter_name_or_model_text: You must enter at least the name or model of the vehicle to save it
alert.enter_type_text: You must enter at least the type of event to save it
alert.enter_title_text: Please enter a title to proceed
alert.enter_date_text: Please enter a date to proceed.
alert.file_created_text: The file has been created, you can find it in the 'Documents/vehicles-control' folder on your device or memory card. It is a file with your user number and a '.vcc' extension
alert.file_restored_text: The backup has been successfully restored
alert.actual_data_will_be_rewrite: Current data will be overwritten by the backup.
alert.no_connected_to_backup_account: Not connected to any backup account
alert.no_connected_to_backup_account_text: To select automatic backup, you must connect to a Drive account and create an initial backup
alert.no_backup_files_text: To select automatic backup, you must create an initial backup
alert.update_files_text: Old data will be removed and updated with the current data
alert.imposible_to_close_session_text: You cannot log out while performing reading, writing, or deletion operations in the cloud
alert.no_fished_op_detected_text: An interruption in a Download, Upload, or Drive cleanup operation has been detected; to ensure the integrity of your cloud data, you may press 'ACCEPT' and perform an update with the current data from your device

mainpage.main_text: You don't have any registered vehicles yet. Create the first one!

userpage.is_not_posibble_to_change_text: Access has been made through an external provider, so it is not possible to change the data

notifications.not_allowed_text: Notifications have not been explicitly allowed by the user; they must be enabled from settings
notifications.auto_text: The backup will be updated with each change made in the app
notifications.no_auto_text: The backup will need to be updated manually from the Backup menu

backup.information_text: To restore a backup on your device, press the 'Download and Restore' button
backup.in_device_text: If you expect to change devices or want to save a complete copy of your data, you can use this method. A document with a '.vcc' extension will be saved in the DOCUMENTS folder on your device or memory card
backup.in_device_text_recovery: To recover the data on your new device, you will need to search for and select the file from your device or memory card again
backup.in_drive_text: By connecting with your Drive account, you can maintain automatic or manual synchronization of your data. This option can be changed from the settings menu. The backup will not be visible in your Drive, avoiding the risk of accidental deletion.
backup.in_drive_text_recovery: To recover data on your new device, simply press the 'Download and Restore' button

exportfile.export_text: Press the icon to export the file

popover.is_connected_info: Connected to Drive, but no backup files found
popover.has_file_info: Connected to Drive and backup files found

problem.text1: If you have experienced any issues, want to suggest improvements, or provide feedback, please do not hesitate to contact us. Please send an email with as many details as possible to:
